identificationModule.briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of BLI5100 in Patients With Erosive Esophagitis
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Phase 3, Double-Blind, Randomized, Two-Phase, Active-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of BLI5100 in Patients With Erosive Esophagitis

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The objective of the Healing Phase of the study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of up to 8 weeks of once daily oral administration of BLI5100 versus a PPI control in healing EE. The objective of the Maintenance Phase of the study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of 24 weeks of once daily oral administration of BLI5100 (low or high dose) versus a PPI control in the maintenance of healed EE.

armGroups.label: Healing Phase - BLI5100
armGroups.description: During the Healing Phase, patients will take BLI5100 once daily, orally, for up to 8 weeks.

armGroups.label: Healing Phase - PPI Control
armGroups.description: During the Healing Phase, patients will take a PPI control once daily, orally, for up to 8 weeks.

armGroups.label: Maintenance Phase - BLI5100 Low Dose
armGroups.description: During the Maintenance Phase, patients will take BLI5100 low dose once daily, orally, for 24 weeks.

armGroups.label: Maintenance Phase - BLI5100 High Dose
armGroups.description: During the Maintenance Phase, patients will take BLI5100 high dose once daily, orally, for 24 weeks.

armGroups.label: Maintenance Phase - PPI Control
armGroups.description: During the Maintenance Phase, patients will take a PPI control once daily, orally, for 24 weeks.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Healing Phase: Percentage of patients with complete healing by Week 8.
Maintenance Phase: Percentage of patients who maintain complete healing through Week 24.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Healing Phase: Percentage of 24-hour heartburn-free days through Week 8.
Maintenance Phase: Percentage of 24-hour heartburn-free days through Week 24.
